name: Format a number. Three decimal places. toFixed
instruction:
Write a function `formatNumber` that takes one number and returns it rounded to three decimal places.

Use `toFixed` for rounding. Convert the result to a number using unary plus.

Examples of running a function:
```javascript
formatNumber(1) // 1
formatNumber(1.1) // 1.1
formatNumber(1.11) // 1.11
formatNumber(1.1111) // 1.111
formatNumber(1.231) // 1.231
formatNumber(1.2398) // 1.24
```
